modName: GUT FIX for Dark Elven Armour
summary: A non-replacer version of Flobulon\'s \"Dark Elven Thalmor-style Equipment\", with gut fix to make the cuirass thinner.
descriptionHtml:
Hi everybody, this is a non-replacer version of Flobulon\'s amazing retexture: \"Dark Elven Thalmor-style Equipment\", available [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=712]here[/url].

I really love the elven armor and I think Flobulon\'s is the best retexture on the nexus, but I think that my armour should be kinda exclusive, so I looked for a non-replacer version of it, and found this one from 3jiou: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3741]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3741[/url]

Anyway, I was quite unsatisfied by the horrible vanilla shape of the cuirass, so I edited the mod to use alternative meshes, reducing the gut.

[b]THIS IS ONLY THE GUTFIX, YOU STILL HAVE TO DOWNLOAD 3JIOU\'S NON-REPLACER VERSION OF THE ARMOUR!!![/b]

I included two .esp files: one with the original armour stats, and one with enhanched stats, to make the armour slightly more powerful than glass armour.

I realized this for personal use, but I decided to share it ;)

Credits for the fixed meshes to shodan44, check it out: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6524]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6524[/url]

INSTALLATION:
1) Download and install the non-replacer version of the armour from 3jiou
2) Extract the .7z in your skyrim/data directory and answer \"yes\" when asked to overwrite

or just install it via NMM, allowing the mod to overwrite the files.
author: Nekrovision
